title: 3 bizarre (and delightful) ancient theories about bird migration - Lucy Cooke

multiple-choice.question: Who shot down the stork that provided evidence of the bird's incredible flight from Africa to Europe?
What was the African origin of the spear found in the stork?

options.label: D
options.text: A spear made of a plant

multiple-choice.question: What was the name of the scientist who proposed that birds transform into different bodies that suited the season?
What was the name of the bird that was said to remove its feathers and hibernate in holes?
How many kilometers can some bird migrations span?
What is the estimated percentage of all bird species that migrate each year?
What was the name of the scientist who used aluminum rings to tag the legs of two thousand storks to track their migration route?
How many aluminum rings were found in Africa by Johannes Thienemann's team?
What was the duration of Johannes Thienemann's experiment to track the migration route of storks?
What was the result of Johannes Thienemann's experiment to track the migration route of storks?

options.label: C
options.text: It definitively established that storks migrate from Europe to Africa

options.label: D
options.text: It definitively established that storks fly to the moon
